backend.tradesystem.general_managers

Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.tradesystem.Manager
      • backend.tradesystem.general_managers.LoginManager

  • public class LoginManager
extends Manager
    Used for logging in and registering, as well as any setup like changing global settings

                                     java.io.IOException
        Registers a user
        Parameters:
        username - username of new user
        password - password of new user
        type - the type of user
        Returns:
        The ID of the newly created user
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistsException - username is not unique
        BadPasswordException - password isn't valid
        java.io.IOException - issues with getting database files
